# Edelmetall Cham - Block all search engine crawlers
# This site should not be indexed by search engines

User-agent: *
Disallow: /

# Block specific major search engines explicitly
User-agent: Googlebot
Disallow: /

User-agent: Bingbot
Disallow: /

User-agent: Slurp
Disallow: /

User-agent: DuckDuckBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: Baiduspider
Disallow: /

User-agent: YandexBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: facebookexternalhit
Disallow: /

# No sitemap provided - site should not be crawled
